thread.title: Bahri and wife issue demand letter to sister-in-law
thread.title_full: Bahri and wife issue demand letter to sister-in-law

title: Bahri and wife issue demand letter to sister-in-law
text:
More 
Former MACC special operations division director Bahri Mohd Zin and his wife have sent a notice of demand to Noraihan Che Ali to retract her statement in a press conference made last month against them or risk facing a defamation suit. 
The notice was sent by the firm of Haniff Khatri to Noraihan Che Ali yesterday, giving her 10 days to retract and apologise for what she said at the Jan 20 press conference in a hotel in Subang Jaya last month, which they said was slander and defamatory. 
In the notice, Bahri and his wife Noor Haslina Abdullah, claimed the statements by Noraihan, who was married to Noor Haslina's brother, was wrong in law and had affected their reputation.
